name: bloxmania-shopify-theme
description: BloxMania - Digital Goods Marketplace Shopify Theme

scripts.dev: npm run build:css:dev && dotenv -e .env -- shopify theme dev
scripts.dev:concurrent: concurrently "npm run build:css:watch" "dotenv -e .env -- shopify theme dev"
scripts.build: npm run build:css:prod && npm run optimize:css && npm run build:components && npm run build:theme-settings && dotenv -e .env -- shopify theme push
scripts.analyze:css: npm run build:css:prod && npm run optimize:css:dev
scripts.push: npm run build:css:prod && npm run optimize:css && npm run build:components && dotenv -e .env -- shopify theme push
scripts.package: npm run build:css:prod && npm run optimize:css && npm run build:components && dotenv -e .env -- shopify theme package
scripts.performance:test: npm run build:css:prod && npm run optimize:css && echo 'CSS performance optimization completed. Check css-optimization-report.json for details.'
scripts.critical:extract: node -e "const opt = require('./build/css-bundle-optimizer.js'); new opt().extractCriticalCSS().then(() => console.log('Critical CSS extracted successfully'));"
scripts.env:setup: cp shopify.env.example .env && echo 'Created .env file from example. Please edit .env with your store settings.'
scripts.docs:serve: cd docs && python -m http.server 8080 || python3 -m http.server 8080

author: BloxMania Team

theme.name: BloxMania Theme
theme.description: Digital goods marketplace theme for gaming items
